messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] B.C. unschoolers, oldtimer too
messages.msgSnippet: ...  ... As soon as I started reading this I thought *Hey I know you, Tina!*. We re getting a lot of Canadians in the mix  of this list aren t we ;-)
messages.messageBody:
Tina Pearson wrote:
>
> From: Tina Pearson <ebus89@...>
>
> Hi Brooke and Joshua.
> We're here in B.C. too
<snip>
> If you haven't yet done this, you might take a look at the homeschool-ca
> mailing list. I think Debbie (Buzz) is on both these lists too. (Hi
> Debbie, again.) There is a lot of information and deep support on the
> ca list.
>
> Tina in Reid Lake, B.C.

As soon as I started reading this I thought *Hey I know you, Tina!*.
We're getting a lot of Canadians in the mix of this list aren't we ;-)

Buzz on both lists
--
